actionCalls.description: This apex class is for checking the BU Specific logic.

actionCalls.label: Case creator when the case is closed

decisions.name: Check_case_creator_if_case_closed
decisions.label: Check case creator if case closed

rules.name: Send_email_to_creator_case_closed
rules.label: Send email to creator case closed

rules.name: New_Closed_Rejected_Resolved
rules.conditionLogic: 1 OR (2 AND 3) OR (4 AND 5) OR (6 AND 7) OR 8 OR (9 AND (10 OR 13 OR 14 OR 15)) OR (11 AND 12)
rules.label: New,Closed,Rejected,Resolved

decisions.name: Check_if_case_is_from_email
decisions.label: Check if case is from email

decisions.name: Check_if_the_Origin_is_Email
decisions.label: Check if the Origin is Email

rules.name: Open_Stage
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 OR (6 AND 7)) AND 2) OR (2 AND 3 AND (4 OR 5))
rules.label: New - Status

Flow.description: added condition to send an email for ABFL when case is categorized . Added condition to send email/sms when case status is Closed Duplicate Added logic to send welcome email on account recat Added Regional Template Logic Added Condition on Decision box -Email Template Found
